text: Perry also defended Osteen in his Facebook video. "I know there's been some controversy about Joel Osteen and him not opening the doors of the church,” Perry said in the video. "Let me tell you something: Joel and [his wife] Victoria are amazing people. There's no way they would lock people out of the church and not let people in for shelter. There were some safety concerns… I'm sending $250,000 to Lakewood to make sure that they can get all of the supplies people need, and I know that they will… That's the kind of person he is."
